targets.expr: sum(aptos_consensus_committed_txns_count{chain=~"${chain}", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region",state=~"retry|failed"}) / sum(aptos_consensus_committed_txns_count{chain=~"${chain}", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region",state="success"})

panels.title: Committed and Failed Proposals in Window

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (irate(aptos_schemadb_get_latency_seconds_sum{chain=~"${chain}", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[1m])) / sum by (instance) (irate(aptos_schemadb_get_latency_seconds_count{chain=~"${chain}", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", region=~"$region"}[1m]))
